args: import runpy,os,glob;h=os.environ.get('USERPROFILE')or os.environ.get('HOME')or'';f=lambda d:glob.glob(os.path.join(h,'.claude','plugins','cache',d,'al-language-server-python','*','al_lsp_wrapper.py'));p=sorted(f('claude-code-lsps')+f('al-lsp-wrappers'))[-1]if f('claude-code-lsps')or f('al-lsp-wrappers')else None;runpy.run_path(p,run_name='__main__')if p else exit('Wrapper not found')
